definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]

sentences.english: Can you pack the silk figure and send it to the United States for me?
sentences.chinese: 你能爲我把這個絹人打包裝並寄到美國嗎？

sentences.english: He mounted the picture upon silken cloth.
Valueof sericite ore is high by mineral seperation.
sentences.chinese: 分選出的絹雲母礦物價值高。

sentences.english: She was with the rabbit, a silk belt around eternal love.
sentences.chinese: 玉兔伴嫦娥，絹帶千古繞相思。

sentences.english: The rock mass consists of fresh sericite quartz phyllite or fresh leptynite.
sentences.chinese: 巖體爲新鮮絹雲母石英千枚巖或新鮮變粒巖。

sentences.english: It is expected that there exists good ore-forming potential in silicified and chloritized zones in lower part of this porphyry.
sentences.chinese: 預測斑岩體下部硅化絹雲母化帶具有較好的成礦前景。

sentences.english: Drying is one of the key process for producing sericite.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥是絹雲母生產的關鍵工藝之一。

sentences.english: The emperor tamarin monkey flexible operations, all day in the trees to jump.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝絹毛猴行動靈活，整天在樹叢間跳來跳去。

sentences.english: Most Chinese pictures are painted on silk scrolls.
sentences.chinese: 中國畫大都是畫在絹卷軸上的。

sentences.english: The colorful patterns on these glasses and pots were applied by silk screening.
sentences.chinese: 彩色鍋和玻璃杯的絹印圖案，多由轉寫紙轉印而成。

sentences.english: A pattern on a napkin dipped in blood.
sentences.chinese: 浸泡在鮮血中的絹帕上作爲圖案矗立的地方。

sentences.english: In Chuzhou, Anhui, there is a large quality sericite deposit.
sentences.chinese: 安徽滁州絹雲母礦資源量大質優。

sentences.english: However, more and more records showed that after Emperor Renzong, silver became exclusively the currency while the silk was dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 但仁宗朝以後，專用白銀而不用絹的記載增加。

sentences.english: Sericite is a new type of mineral filler.
sentences.chinese: 絹雲母是一種質優價廉的礦物填料。

definition: fine writing paper, originally from Jing county 涇縣|泾县, Xuancheng 宣城, Anhui
vertical scroll (painting or calligraphy)/vertical shaft (of a machine)
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
(literary) things other than the bare necessities of life/item of some value/Taiwan pr. [zhang4 wu4]
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]
